rules_text:
At the beginning of each player’s upkeep, if that player developed The Eternity Project, they scry X, where X is the number of development counters on The Eternity Project.
Develop 4–{3} [i]({3}: Note your name and put a development counter on this. Any player may develop this as a sorcery if there are fewer than four counters on this.)[/i]
